title: HeXen II: 20th Anniversary Edition
description:
HeXen II: 20th Anniversary Edition
Based on Hammer of Thyrion 1.5.7

Features:
Hammer of Thyrion 1.5.7 base
HeXen II, Portal of Praevus, Fortress of 4 Doors, Rino MP I & II, + mods
HeXenWorld, CTF, Rival Kingdoms, Dungeon Break, HeXArena, Siege
Tweaked config for high performance
Multiplayer functionality fully restored
GameSpy 3D Qtracker integration
QEffectsGL integration
44/16 FLAC

During the early months of 1996, HeXen II development was born. What would later be showcased that year at E3 was released to the public on August 31, 1997. A year later, Portal of PrÃ¦vus was brought onto the scene featuring new levels, enemies, and a new playable character. In 2000, the engine source code was released by Raven and is still actively devloped to this day. Much has happened over the last two decades. For this reason, we feel that it is appropriate to release this 20th anniversary package featuring the greatest content collected over the years, tailored to simplicity. Here's to 20 more!

HeXenWorld.org has been opened to provide a strong community base and offer long term support for these games. The HeXenWorld forums have been opened if you are having issues with your game, want to grab the latest build, wish to stay updated on different HeXen projects, or would like to communicate with other players around the world. You can visit the forums at http://hexenworld.org/forums
